name: Antikriz
artists_text: Dj / Organizer : Antikriz / Horrordelic ^ Sick Lion Records

name: Dubvibes & CultureDark
artists_text:
Paulo Laércio aka Dubvibes. 

 From Pará from Ilha do Mosqueiro and presents his project created from an incentive to more psychedelic culture in Ilha de Mosqueiro (State of Pará). 

He started his artistic journey in 2012 producing music for emulators and Flash animations. Self-taught by nature, he sought to learn more about electronic music for dancefloors, thus originating the beginning of a work in the beach areas of the island since 2015 playing Dubstep. 

After a while being influenced by Hard Electro and Synthwave styles, he came in 2018 with the first creations, releasing his first authorial song. In 2019 he discovered new trends such as Darkpsy, Hi-Tech and Psycore, and in 2020 he started the first productions within these styles, embracing psycore, emmotionpsy and studying Forestcore.

name: Diabolical Orchestra
artists_text:
Gokul kannan is the man behind the project Diabolical Orchestra. 

The main vision of the project is to make people experience every kind of emotions in the dance floor. 

He firmly believes that there is a light after darkness-

 So the project mainly focus on dark euphoric ambience, mechanical leads and fx, creative break beats and bpm variations to ensure both darkness and bright elements can be experienced in the music

name: Cosmic BlueMoon
artists_text:
Cosmic Bluemoon is an alias of Harshvardhan Sharma who hails from Kolkata, India.

 The journey of this project started in 2006. A visit to Goa in 2005 changed the perception of music and helped in starting this project.

Magical psychedelic sounds from Polyphonia, Alien Mental, Orestis and other artists gave birth to the style of music which is showcased by Cosmic Bluemoon.

Performed in festivals around Asia and DJing since 2006, Cosmic Bluemoon has been part of multiple record labels. He has also released several VA's with the legendary Horrordelic Records and aims to help promote new producers to release tracks in the label.

name: Gloomy Phantom
artists_text:
Dra Orcon/ Gloomy Phantom / Soodoom by Timo Coerdt. 

If you  just started to dive deep into Darkpsy, be sure to check out this and let the darkness embrace you (once again).

10 years of True Darkpsy releases here at Horrordelic. Gloomy Phantom has always been one of the pioneers in the Darkpsy scene and everyone can feel the presence and the Darkness this man brings to the floor and to your Mind.

name: Psytanic
artists_text:
Stumbeled upon her forest party with darkpsy on the speakers in 2008, with only DJ on the lineup was no other than Antikriz by coincidence(?). 

Fell in love with the music. Bought own CDJs in 2011 and started playing at small parties herself. 

Then fell in love with Antikriz. Started playing music together, traveling around blasting darkpsy on the soundsystems. 

In 2018 hey had a wedding and then 2 kids, so she took a little break from the musicscene, but is now returning from the dead to do the evil work of Horrordelic in form of dark sound and art.
